text: The past year, we have been on a remarkable journey,
The University of Maryland continues to excel
thanks to the hard work and dedication
of our students, faculty, staff, alumni, and friends.
Together, we are taken on the world's grand challenges,
united in purpose to improve the lives of all human kind
As we look ahead to the coming year,
and recommit ourselves to creating a better future.
I hope you find time to rest, reflect,
and cherish the moments with your loved ones.
your families and communities, joy and peace.
